page.title: Molson offers special dividend to smoothen merger with Adolph <b>...</b>
page.text: NEW YORK, November 5 (newratings.com) - Molson Inc (MOL.A.TOR) has announced a special dividend payment worth about C\$381 million for its shareholders, as part of its plans for a merger with the Adolph Coors Company (RKY).
